subject: Little League
lead_paragraph: A Little League softball coach in Radnor, Pa., was accused of grabbing an 11-year-old African-American youth by the neck and yelling racial slurs at him, the police said.
snippet: A Little League softball coach in Radnor, Pa., was accused of grabbing an 11-year-old African-American youth by the neck and yelling racial slurs at him, the police said.
